gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.fetcher.gui.workers

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.fetcher.gui.workers.Dataset

  • public class Dataset
extends Object
    An object that contains information about a given dataset.
    Author:
    Thomas Maroulis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(String endpoint,
       String graph,
       boolean remote,
       String rootNodeNS,
       DBConnectionParameters dbConnectionParameters)
        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Construct new local dataset with specified parameters. This constructor is meant for local datasets only and parameter remote must be false.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - sparql endpoint uri
        graph - graph uri
        remote - must be set to false
        rootNodeNS - regex for matching the URI of root nodes in dataset
        dbConnectionParameters - connection parameters for the db
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameters are null, if remote==true or if endpoint.isEmpty()==true

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(String endpoint,
       String graph,
       boolean remote,
       String rootNodeNS,
       String unmodifiedLocalGraph,
       String transformedLocalGraph,
       DBConnectionParameters dbConnectionParameters)
        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Construct new remote dataset with specified parameters. This constructor is meant for remote datasets only and parameter remote must be set to true. No parameters may be null.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - sparql endpoint uri
        graph - graph uri
        remote - must be set to true
        rootNodeNS - regex for matching the URI of root nodes in dataset
        unmodifiedLocalGraph - local graph uri where the dataset is to be copied to with geometries intact
        transformedLocalGraph - local graph uri where the dataset is to be copied to with geometries transformed
        dbConnectionParameters - connection parameters for the db
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameters are null, if remote==false or if endpoint.isEmpty()==true

public String getEndpoint()
        Returns:
        sparql endpoint uri

        @NotNull
public String getGraph()
        Returns:
        graph uri

      • isRemote

        public boolean isRemote()
        Returns:
        true if dataset is located remotely, false otherwise

      • getRootNodeNS

        public String getRootNodeNS()
        Returns:
        regex for matching the URI of root nodes in dataset

      • getUnmodifiedLocalGraph

        @NotNull
public String getUnmodifiedLocalGraph()
                               throws IllegalStateException
        Returns:
        local graph uri where the dataset is to be copied to with geometries intact
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if dataset is not remote

      • getTransformedLocalGraph

        @NotNull
public String getTransformedLocalGraph()
                                throws IllegalStateException
        Returns:
        local graph uri where the dataset is to be copied to with geometries transformed
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if dataset is not remote

      • setLinks

        public void setLinks(String linkFile,
            boolean setFirstInLinks)
              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Set link file to be used for this dataset.
        Parameters:
        linkFile - path of link file or empty if no link file is to be used
        setFirstInLinks - true if this set is first in link file, false otherwise. This value is ignored if linkFile.isEmpty()==true
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if linkFile is null or if linkFile on disk does not exist

      • doLinksExist

        public boolean doLinksExist()
        Returns:
        true if link file has been specified for this dataset, false otherwise

      • getLinksFIle

        public String getLinksFIle()
                    throws IllegalStateException
        Returns:
        path of link file
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if a link file has not been specified for this dataset

      • isThisSetFirstInLinks

        public Boolean isThisSetFirstInLinks()
                              throws IllegalStateException
        Returns:
        true if this dataset comes first in link file, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if a link file has not been specified for this dataset

      • getDBConnectionParameters

        public DBConnectionParameters getDBConnectionParameters()
        Returns:
        connection parameters for the db
